lead_paragraph: Roshen, the confectionary company owned by President Petro O. Poroshenko of Ukraine, says that assets of the company worth $39 million in Lipetsk, Russia, have been seized this week by the Russian authorities

headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: Russia Seizes Leader’s Assets

snippet: Roshen, the confectionary company owned by President Petro O. Poroshenko of Ukraine, says that assets of the company worth $39 million in Lipetsk, Russia, have been seized this week by the Russian authorities
abstract: Roshen, candy corporation owned by Ukrainian President Petro O Poroshenko, reports seizure of $39 million in company assets by Russian authorities and vows to fight confiscation in court.
